runs.comm: lands it on a fullish length outside off and the batsman leaves it alone, gauges the movement
left alone to the keeper and much straighter this time
slightly wider outside the off stump and he safely lets it go -  three leaves in a row, yes this is a T20 game, not kidding
make that four out of four, but this time Masakadza was expecting a wide, the umpire had a long look at it and well was in favour of the bowler
five leaves in a row, but this time it's called a wide! Zim off the mark but not off the bat
lands it outside off and he's happy to let this one go as well
finally some bat on ball, but time he edges it to his pad and takes a single
Vinay slides down the leg side and the batsman tries to glide it down
stays behind the line and punches it softly in front of mid-on and sets off
slower and fuller and he pushes it straight to mid-on
short and towards the helmet, Taylor hooks but gets a top edge which beats the keeper safely and runs to fine leg
steers it towards backward point and the fielder attacks the ball well
dabs it towards the slips with soft hands
drops it in front of cover and contemplates a single but the fielder charges in
Masakadza tries to force the pace after being bogged down, he gives the bowler the charge and ends up flat-batting it straight to Rohit at mid-off, he hops and takes the catch fairly easily
appeal for a run-out! He pushes it towards mid-off and sets off, Taylor sends him back and the throw is fired to the keeper but Chibhabha makes it back on time
stays rooted to the crease and flashes at one outside off and misses
stays back and drops it to the packed off side field
steers it towards cover point and no chance of a single there
strays on the pads and he tucks it to fine leg, good over again, very nearly a maiden
on middle and leg and softly tucked to midwicket
nice line, cramps him for room, Chibhabha can only taps it back to the bowler
tucks him up for room again and he can only push it back to the bowler
he makes a bit of room to slash it away but can only chop it back to the bowler
now he opens the face and softly steers it to backward point and picks up a quick single
Taylor moves across to a fullish delivery moving away and prods forward tentatively and is beaten, he's struggling a bit too
lands outside off and he's tempted to poke at that, tries to dab it to third man but misses
angles towards middle and off, he swings at it and gets an outside edge on the up to third man
tries to slam that over the on side but ends up mistiming it along the ground to mid-on
opens the face of the bat and dabs it just wide of backward point for a single
the first convincing boundary, Dinda drops it short for a chance, Chibhabha uses the crease and pounds it over square leg, couple of bounces and four
gives him the charge and Dinda takes the pace off the ball, he ends up pushing it towards mid-off
nice shot! He comes down the track a bit and takes it on the half volley, crisp drive past mid-on
punches it towards extra cover
comes down the track and punches to long-off
skids through and the ball clips his pads outside the line of leg, stifled appeal
punches it towards cover
the leg stump is down! Ojha tosses it up on middle and leg, Chibhabha exposes his stumps a bit in attempting a slog and misses it completely, timber and out
gets forward and drives to cover
fetches it from outside off and sweeps to short fine leg
opens the face and dabs it to short third man
this one skids through and he clips it to midwicket
the reverse sweep, he fetches it from middle and places it wide of backward point, not much pace to carry it to the rope
the reverse sweep again but this time he finds backward point
sweeps firmly but Ashwin picks it up at deep square leg
tossed up on middle and he too sweeps to deep square leg
drops it in front of backward point again and sets off quickly, good running
sweeps towards deep square leg and Ashwin nearly over-runs the ball, he didnt watch the spin early enough but managed to get a hand to it
dabs it towards point for a single
sweeps and nearly bisects the gap between two fielders at deep square leg, good fielding by one of them to cut it off
comes down the track and taps it to the off side
lovely shot! He chips down the track and gets to the pitch and lofts crisply over the bowler's head
turned to the on side
down the track and he fails to hit it, the ball hits his pad and rolls back to the keeper, he scampers back to the crease and Ojha tries to hit the stumps but misses
turns it to the on side
dabs it towards point and sets off quickly
fetches it from middle and plays the reverse sweep, it was in the air for a while and Jadeja picked it up at deep point
turns it to the on side
he perfects the reverse sweep this time! Fetches it from middle, deft touch, places it well wide of short third man, must have felt good
tries to sweep again and the ball takes the edge, then the pad and lobs away
tucks it towards square leg
taps it towards the off side
stays back and punches it towards point
full outside off and driven to extra cover
Taibu's hitting it nicely off the middle, gets on his knee and sweeps powerfully in front of square along the turf, down to deep midwicket
gives it more air and he drives through the line to long-off
stays back and punches it to midwicket
tossed up and he tucks it to the on side
down the leg side, tries to sweep but  misses
at the last minute opens the face and dabs it past short third man
the switch hit doesnt come off well, hits his pads and rolls to the off side
punches with the turn to midwicket
tosses it up,he  pushes it to midwicket
full on middle and pushed to wide long-on
tossed up on middle and clipped to midwicket
on his knee and he sweeps hard to deep square, good running by Taibu

Yusuf take a bow! One of the better outfield catches you will see, Taylor gives the charge and aims to scoop that over the sight screen Yusuf gets across from long-on, runs to his left, leaps and cups it with both hands and falls and still holds on to the catch
appeal for a lbw but the ball would have missed leg stump
tucks it to the on side
tucks it to the on side
he oversteps, he pushes it to the off side
fails to out away the free hit , driven firmly down the ground to long-off
attempts the reverse sweep, the ball rolls to the off side
whips it to the on side
another reverse sweep and he tamely pushes it just wide of point
stays back and punches it towards long-off
tries to sweep and the ball hits his pads, big appeal by Ojha, missing leg
gets on his knee and sweeps to deep square leg
rocks back and slaps it behind point
sweeps and gets a top edge which clears short fine leg
strong reverse sweep by Coventry, hits the middle of the bat and races towards deep point, Ojha misfields, he ought to have stopped that at deep point
Coventry uses his feet, he gets under the bounce and carts that over deep extra cover
the reverse sweep again! He plays it more behind square on the off side, beats Ojha comfortably
makes room gets under the bounce and scoops it towards long-off
forces it to the on side
excellent yorker and that has Taibu in a tangle, they pinch a single
raw power! Vinay bowls the slower ball and Coventry makes room, waits for the ball and biffs it wide of long-off
good yorker this time, Coventry just manages to dig it out, they pinch a single
makes room and biffs it towards extra cover, they rush through for a single, the throw is to Vinay and he parries it to the stumps but the batsman's home
lost in the trees! Vinay pitches it up, Coventry makes room, gets under the bounce and launches it high and far over long-off
good yorker, dug out back to the bowler
Taibu attempts one of the outrageoius scoops made famous by Dilshan and McCullum, he picked the yorker try and pull it off, moves across his stumps and the ball rolls to short fine leg
the middle stump is flattened! Quick yorker honing in on the blockhole, as straight as it can get, Coventry makes room and loses his middle stump which goes back a couple of yards
Chigumbura digs out a yorker and Ojha does really well to dive to his left and stop it, Taibu was off the blocks in a flash and he was home, the throw was to the bowler';s end
slashes it down to third man
on the blockhole outside off and he digs it out to the off side
forces it to the on side and pushes hard for the second run
add 6 to that! Tossed up outside off and he stays at the crease and slams it over long-off
goes the other way this time! Uses the crease and lofts him high over long-on
tossed up on middle and leg and he turns at the crease and slogs over square leg, one bounce and four

Raina take a bow! Chigumbura tries to hit that into orbit over the on side, gets a top edge and Raina runs backwards from midwicket, doesn't take his eyes off and catches it, falls and still retains control of the ball, stunning effort, three men were chasing that
stays back and cuts to deep point
well bowled, on the blockhole and squirted back to the bowler
full outside off and pushed to deep point, Taibu runs the first hard and puts pressure on the fielder, the throw was wide
swings and fails to out away a length ball, tries to shovel it over the on side but the ball hits his arm and they steal a run
driven to long-off and the throw is wide again, Taibu's running has been excellent
full toss and Greg Lamb makes room and slashes at it, the ball beats backward point
moves across his stumps and tries to paddle it away but the ball hits his pads outside the line of off stump and rolls away, appeal but that wasn't hitting
